title: How Meghan Became Victim to the Right-Wing Tabloid Agenda

media:group.media:title: How Meghan Became Victim to the Right-Wing Tabloid Agenda
media:group.media:description:
*Check the video chapters for all trigger warnings involved*
In this video I am investigating the history behind the UK's conservative and reactionary tabloid industry and how it's successfully promoting racist and misogynistic viewpoints along with the "anti-woke" agenda, and how this ended up with a country-wide hatred of Meghan Markle, leading to her and Prince Harry bolting to America.
